trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_00<tab>Fibubb Gah seeks aid to replenish the Brotherhood's stock of healing salves.

TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_01<tab>Fibubb Gah explains that a true warrior needs to be as concerned with the arts of healing as with the arts of war. Seek out succulents within Zanr'ak and harvest their rejuvenating sap.
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained a supply of rejuvenating sap. Return to the Ring of Ash and deliver the healing salve to Fibubb Gah.

TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_SEQ_03<tab>You have delivered the rejuvenating sap to Fibubb Gah. The proud warrior commends your efforts, claiming that a Brotherhood soldier would sooner die in battle than on a sickbed.
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_TODO_00<tab>Obtain vials of rejuvenating sap from succulents in Zanr'ak.
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the rejuvenating sap to Fibubb Gah.
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_001<tab>We of the Brotherhood of Ash are proud soldiers all. Yet even the greatest soldier can starve without sustenance, or be crippled by injury.

TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_002<tab>We bear our battle wounds as badges of honor, but a festering cut can take one's life as surely as the blade of one's foe. A true warrior neglects not the arts of healing.
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_003<tab>My task for you, honored ally, is simple yet needful: gather from the desert plants of Zanr'ak the rejuvenating sap we use to salve our hurts.

TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_004<tab>Though our foes make no use of such remedies, they will nevertheless be loath to relinquish them to you. Have a care you do not sustain such injuries that you fail to return!
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_011<tab>Gather the clear sap of the Zanr'ak desert plants, and aid us in keeping our warriors hale.
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_021<tab>Welcome, honored ally. Have you the sap we require?
TEXT_BANAMA103_01224_FIBUBBGAH_000_022<tab>Yes, this will allow our wounded to return to the front lines of battle where a glorious death awaits. No true warrior wishes to wither away on a sickbed...
